articles.author: David W Cerny, Marek Strzelecki
articles.title: Floods claim two more casualties as torrential rain batters central Europe - Reuters
articles.description: Some parts of the Czech Republic and Poland faced their worst flooding in almost three decades.
articles.content: LIPOVA-LAZNE, Czech Republic/WARSAW, Sept 15 (Reuters) - One person drowned in southwest Poland, a rescue worker was killed in Austria and thousands were evacuated in the Czech Republic after heavy r… [+3246 chars]

articles.author: Craig Stirling
articles.title: World Braces for Fed Easing Amid 36-Hour Rate Rollercoaster - Bloomberg
articles.description: The world economy’s tectonic plates will shift this week when a US easing cycle begins, just as officials from Europe to Asia set policy against a backdrop of brittle markets.
articles.content:
